game.name: PUBG Craft BATTLEGROUNDS
game.description:
Are you one of the biggest fans of the popular multiplayer action mobile games like PUBG Battlegrounds? Do you like to explore the highly challenging and addictive shooting games during your vacant hours? If yes, PUBG Craft BATTLEGROUNDS is just for you. The controls are pretty and the gameplay of this brand new action challenge will remain the same i.e. fighting to secure the first place in a War Royale. There are hundreds of players to fight with in this online multiplayer battle royale.

Survival requires alertness and challenging your insane fighting abilities when a horde of enemies will come in front of you. The winner will be only the one who is skilled enough to survive till last. We know that it is pretty difficult to be the ultimate survivor of the last man standing in a war royale. Common! It only requires not more than 10 minutes for a person or a team to enjoy a full tour. Keep eliminating all of your opponents to wear the tag of the winner!

Defeat your enemies with the help of missiles, hand grenades and powerful weapons in this 3D shooter challenge! Every successful killing will allow you to earn some coins through which you can also purchase new guns from the store. Get ready to craft something in this battle royal shooting game where the beautiful and colorful voxel graphics are used! Choose your character and gear up to kill all of your enemies! Good luck to take on the fighting challenge of the last man standing!
